Tickets Now On Sale

29 Apr 2011
Jesse Chan-Norris
We are pleased to announce that tickets are [now on sale][sale] for this year's GoRuCo. Schedule and full talk descriptions are coming soon, but you can grab your tickets now before they sell out. [Buy your tickets now!][sale] [sale]: http://bit.ly/goruco-2011
